page.shortlink: uxprops local storage variables donot persist

description.p: One or more variables that should not be persisted to Local Storage. This property is only available when *[ui:Persist variable values]* is checked.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Variables to NOT persist]* property can be used to explicitly enumerate values that should not be persisted to Local Storage. When variables are persisted to Local Storage, the control values are saved. If the UX contains controls that should not be persisted -- such as a user name and password control -- they should be listed in the *[ui:Variables to NOT persist]* property.

description.p: To prevent variables from being persisted, click the [...] smart field button to open the *[ui:Select Variables]* dialog. Select the variables that should not persist to Local Storage and click *[ui:OK]*.
